actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the price of refined petroleum products.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that immediate steps be taken to comply with the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 by the issuing of a regulation which will lead to a decrease in the difference between the prices charged in the various sections of the United States for refined petroleum products, as defined in such Act.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the price of refined petroleum products.
